verses.verse: <S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> has <S%H1129>built<s%> her <S%H1004>house.<s%> She has carved <S%H2672>out<s%> her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>
She has <S%H2873>prepared<s%> her <S%H2874>meat.<s%> She has <S%H4537>mixed<s%> her <S%H3196>wine.<s%> She has also <S%H6186>set<s%> her <S%H7979>table.<s%>
She has sent <S%H7971>out<s%> her <S%H5291>maidens.<s%> She <S%H7121>cries<s%> <S%H1610>from<s%> the highest <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city:<s%>
"Whoever is <S%H6612>simple,<s%> let him turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H2638>here!<s%>" As for him who is void of <S%H3820>understanding,<s%> she says to <S%H559>him,<s%>
<S%H3212>"Come,<s%> <S%H3898>eat<s%> some of my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H8354>Drink<s%> some of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which I have <S%H4537>mixed!<s%>
<S%H5800>Leave<s%> your <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H2421>ways,<s%> and live. <S%H833>Walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H998>understanding.<s%>"
He who <S%H3256>corrects<s%> a <S%H3887>mocker<s%> <S%H3947>invites<s%> <S%H7036>insult.<s%> He who <S%H3198>reproves<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man invites <S%H3971>abuse.<s%>
<S%H3198>Don't<s%> reprove a <S%H3887>scoffer,<s%> lest he <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3198>you.<s%> Reprove a wise <S%H2450>man,<s%> and he will love <S%H157>you.<s%>
<S%H5414>Instruct<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man,<s%> and he will be still wiser. <S%H3045>Teach<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3254>man,<s%> and he will increase in <S%H3948>learning.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> The <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
For by me your <S%H3117>days<s%> will be <S%H7235>multiplied.<s%> The <S%H8141>years<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%> will be <S%H3254>increased.<s%>
If you are <S%H2449>wise,<s%> you are <S%H2449>wise<s%> for <S%H3887>yourself.<s%> If you mock, you alone will bear <S%H5375>it.<s%>
She <S%H3427>sits<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%> on a <S%H3678>seat<s%> in the high <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city,<s%>
To <S%H7121>call<s%> to those who <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H3474>by,<s%> who go straight on their <S%H734>ways,<s%>
"Whoever is <S%H6612>simple,<s%> let him turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H2638>here.<s%>" as for him who is void of <S%H3820>understanding,<s%> she says to <S%H559>him,<s%>
But he <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know that the <S%H7496>dead<s%> are <S%H7121>there,<s%> that her guests are in the <S%H6012>depths<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
